mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_qualification_apply ( user_id, real_name, organization, contact_phone, apply_reason, attachment_url, apply_status, audit_remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{realName}, #{organization}, #{contactPhone}, #{applyReason}, #{attachmentUrl}, #{applyStatus}, #{auditRemark}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, real_name, organization, contact_phone, apply_reason, attachment_url, apply_status, audit_remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM t_user_qualification_apply WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, user_id, real_name, organization, contact_phone, apply_reason, attachment_url, apply_status, audit_remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM t_user_qualification_apply WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT qa.id, qa.user_id, qa.real_name, qa.organization, qa.contact_phone, qa.apply_reason, qa.attachment_url, qa.apply_status, qa.audit_remark, qa.is_deleted, qa.create_time, qa.update_time FROM t_user_qualification_apply qa LEFT JOIN t_user u ON qa.user_id = u.id WHERE qa.is_deleted = 0
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND qa.apply_status = #{status}
ORDER BY qa.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_qualification_apply SET apply_status = #{status}, audit_remark = #{auditRemark}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
